## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (60.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-29.5, -49.5), (-18.5, -48.5), (-17.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-13.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5)

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -47.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-11.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5)

### Iron Plate Distribution System
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-12.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -43.5), (-8.5, -43.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to access non-existent chests
- Ensure that the target position for accessing a chest has an existing chest before attempting to access it.

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Verify the target position is unoccupied before placing a new entity to avoid placement errors.

### Errors due to full inventory in chests
- Regularly check and manage the inventory levels in chests to prevent blockage and ensure smooth operation.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source chests have the required items for inserters to function properly.
